blocks.name: pwelg
blocks.content: The powerclass is an element of a class closed under union and powerclass operations iff the element is a member of that class. (Contributed by RP, 21-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwelg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wb(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), c0))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))
  simpr(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))
  rspccv(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(c1), c0))
  eleq1d(cpw(cv(s0)), c0, cpw(c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  pweq(cv(s0), c1)
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wi(wcel(cpw(c1), c0), wcel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  simpl(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))
  rspccv(s0, c0, cpw(c1), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  eleq1d(cuni(cv(s0)), c0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cpw(c1)))
  syl6eq(cuni(cv(s0)), c1, cuni(cpw(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cpw(c1)))
  unieq(cv(s0), cpw(c1))
  unipw(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cpw(c1), c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwelg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0))â†’(c1 âˆˆ c0 â†” P(c1)âˆˆ c0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), c1 âˆˆ c0, P(c1)âˆˆ c0)
  syl(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), (c1 âˆˆ c0 â†’ P(c1)âˆˆ c0), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, P(s0)âˆˆ c0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, (â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0), P(s0)âˆˆ c0)
  simpr(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0, P(s0)âˆˆ c0)
  rspccv(s0, c0, c1, P(s0)âˆˆ c0, P(c1)âˆˆ c0)
  eleq1d(P(s0), c0, P(c1), s0 = c1)
  pweq(s0, c1)
  syl(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), (P(c1)âˆˆ c0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ c0), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, (â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0), â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0)
  simpl(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0, P(s0)âˆˆ c0)
  rspccv(s0, c0, P(c1), â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ c0)
  eleq1d(â‹ƒ s0, c0, c1, s0 = P(c1))
  syl6eq(â‹ƒ s0, c1, â‹ƒ P(c1), s0 = P(c1))
  unieq(s0, P(c1))
  unipw(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, P(c1), c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: pwinfig
blocks.content: The powerclass of an infinite set is an infinite set, and vice-versa. Here ` B ` is a class which is closed under both the union and the powerclass operations and which may have infinite sets as members. (Contributed by RP, 21-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwinfig(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wa(wcel(cpw(c1), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(c1), cfn))))
  anbi12d(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c1, c0), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(c1), cfn)))
  pwelg(s0, c0, c1)
  a1i(wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0))), wb(wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wn(wcel(cpw(c1), cfn))))
  notbii(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cpw(c1), cfn))
  pwfi(c1)
  eldif(c1, c0, cfn)
  eldif(cpw(c1), c0, cfn)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwinfig(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0))â†’(c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)â†” P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin), P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin), (c1 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ Â¬ c1 âˆˆ Fin), (P(c1)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ Â¬ P(c1)âˆˆ Fin))
  anbi12d(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), c1 âˆˆ c0, Â¬ c1 âˆˆ Fin, P(c1)âˆˆ c0, Â¬ P(c1)âˆˆ Fin)
  pwelg(s0, c0, c1)
  a1i(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0)), (Â¬ c1 âˆˆ Fin â†” Â¬ P(c1)âˆˆ Fin))
  notbii(c1 âˆˆ Fin, P(c1)âˆˆ Fin)
  pwfi(c1)
  eldif(c1, c0, cfn)
  eldif(P(c1), c0, cfn)
}

blocks.name: pwinfi2
blocks.content: The powerclass of an infinite set is an infinite set, and vice-versa. Here ` U ` is a weak universe. (Contributed by RP, 21-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwinfi2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cwun), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn))))
} = {
  3syl(wcel(c0, cwun), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn))), w3a(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))), wral(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cwun), w3a(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c0, cwun)
  3ad2ant3(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  ralimi(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))), wa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  3simpa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  pwinfig(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwinfi2(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ WUni â†’(c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)â†” P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)))
} = {
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ WUni, (c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)â†” P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)), (Tr(c0)âˆ§ c0 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c0, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c0)))), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0)))
  ibi(c0 âˆˆ WUni, (Tr(c0)âˆ§ c0 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c0, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c0)))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c0, cwun)
  3ad2ant3(Tr(c0), c0 â‰  âˆ…, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c0, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c0))), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0)))
  ralimi(hs0, c0, (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c0, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c0)), (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0))
  3simpa(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0, P(hs0)âˆˆ c0, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c0, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c0))
  pwinfig(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: pwinfi3
blocks.content: The powerclass of an infinite set is an infinite set, and vice-versa. Here ` T ` is a transitive Tarski universe. (Contributed by RP, 21-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwinfi3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn))))
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(c0, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c1), cdif(c0, cfn))), wral(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0)), wa(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))
  3expia(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))
  tskuni(c0, cv(hs0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))
  tskpw(c0, cv(hs0))
  pwinfig(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wtr(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwinfi3(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ Tarski âˆ§ Tr(c0))â†’(c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)â†” P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)))
} = {
  syl((c0 âˆˆ Tarski âˆ§ Tr(c0)), (c1 âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)â†” P(c1)âˆˆ(c0 \ Fin)), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, (c0 âˆˆ Tarski âˆ§ Tr(c0)), (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0))
  jcad((c0 âˆˆ Tarski âˆ§ Tr(c0)), hs0 âˆˆ c0, â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0, P(hs0)âˆˆ c0)
  3expia(c0 âˆˆ Tarski, Tr(c0), hs0 âˆˆ c0, â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  tskuni(c0, hs0)
  adantr(c0 âˆˆ Tarski, Tr(c0), (hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ P(hs0)âˆˆ c0))
  ex(c0 âˆˆ Tarski, hs0 âˆˆ c0, P(hs0)âˆˆ c0)
  tskpw(c0, hs0)
  pwinfig(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 âˆˆ Tarski âˆ§ Tr(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: pwinfi
blocks.content: The powerclass of an infinite set is an infinite set, and vice-versa. (Contributed by RP, 21-Mar-2020.)
